greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Like A177904, but start with a(1)=0, a(2)=a(3)=1.
comment: After 7 steps, enters a cycle of length 100. The complete cycle, ending at 31, is shown.
link: Greg Back and Mihai Caragiu, The Greatest Prime Factor and Recurrent Sequences, Fibonacci Quart. 48 (2010), no. 4, 358-362.
mathematica: a[1] = 0; a[2] = a[3] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = FactorInteger[a[n - 1] + a[n - 2] + a[n - 3]][[-1, 1]]; Array[a, 107] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 17 2014 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 19 2010
